channel.title: Error connecting to sever.... BUT THIS IS MY SEVER!
channel.description:
WELL :| i just found out a little ago about this website. i know my own sever for everyone is 127.0.0.1 well i went and put that in the IP then put in the username and password. it stills say error connecting sever press cancel and press starte sever. then i press starte sever and try again and it still wont work..................................wtf :|
please help :cool: :confused:
crusakid -------------------------------------------------- life is like a box of chocholates, you never know what ya gonna get

item.title: Error connecting to sever.... BUT THIS IS MY SEVER!
item.dc:creator: @ThatOneServer Mike_
item.description:
@ThatOneServer wrote:

hmmm are you sure you know how to press enter server without adding a letter to 127.0.0.1?

Read full topic
item.source: Error connecting to sever.... BUT THIS IS MY SEVER!

item.title: Error connecting to sever.... BUT THIS IS MY SEVER!
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Well, here’s a thought, try actually starting the server? I have looked at Mopars client, and when you press the “Start server” button, it says the server has started wether or not the server has actually started. So don’t believe everything you see.

Read full topic

item.title: Error connecting to sever.... BUT THIS IS MY SEVER!

ok i used my ip and put it in then i tryed it and it sayed the same thing omfg… :|[br][size=1]Posted on: January 02, 2007, 05:06:53 PM[/size][hr]any other ideas what might be wrong? :eek:
